xml.data:
Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 13 Parittattika » 13.5 Saṃsaṭṭhavāra » 13.5.1 Paccayānuloma » 13.5.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
Parittattika
Saṃsaṭṭhavāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
42.
1996Parittaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho paritto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  parittaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (1)
1997Mahaggataṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho mahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  mahaggataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (1)
1998Appamāṇaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho appamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  appamāṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe… . (1)
<< 13.5.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāraup Ārammaṇādi >>
